Classic Design Philosophy

The Classic layout emphasizes readability and content hierarchy. It uses traditional blog conventions that readers are familiar with, making it easy to navigate and consume content.

Perfect for writers, journalists, and anyone who wants a clean, professional blog that puts content first.

View Minimalist Layout

Layout Features

  • Traditional blog structure
  • Clean typography
  • Familiar navigation
  • Content-focused design
